          d.addEventListener('load', function () {
            if (window.utag && window.utag.view) {
              const utagView = window.utag.view;
              const persistedUtagView = (data = {}, cb, uids) => {
                window.sessionStorage?.setItem('utagData', JSON.stringify(window.utag_data_dt));
                utagView.call(window.utag, data, cb, uids);
              }
              window.utag.view = persistedUtagView;
              window.utag.view(utag_data_dt, function () {
                console.log('Utag | View Event', { ...window.utag_data_dt });
                delete utag_data_dt.genderSelection;
                delete utag_data_dt.genderPlacement;
                delete utag_data_dt.genderClickFlag;
                delete utag_data_dt.product_finding_method;
                delete utag_data_dt.outfitting_product;
                delete utag_data_dt.final_sale_badge;
                document.cookie = 'dt_gender_placement=undefined; Path=/;';
              });
            }
